cleaned_text: Formulated in Japan, Jaw White Egg Crystal Skin Whitening Supplement is the first ever whitening supplement converted from whitening drip into capsule form. Jaw White Egg Crystal Skin lightens skin pigmentation and melasma by evening out skin tone. This Giant in a bottle hydrates the skin by retaining moisture. Rich in high quality collagen to boost skin elasticity and reduce skin aging signs like wrinkles and fine lines Detox your body 3 days before using Jaw White for treatment. This is the best way to get result. Afterwards use 1 capsule every two days. 1 bottle = 40 Supply Suitable for: Breastfeeding mmums above 3 months , Suitable for people with Gastric, diabetic, hpb, cholesterol Pls check with your doctor if unsure. Not Suitable for: Pregnant for pregnancy less than three months. Ingredients Camu Camu Extract 75g, Hyaluronic Acid
